question: Select the mismatched pair:
choices: First month of pregnancy - Formation of heart
Second month of pregnancy - Movement of foetus
Third month of pregnancy - Formation of most of the major organ systems
Sixth month of pregnancy - Eye lids separate and eye lashes are found
explanation: The answer key indicates option 1 is the mismatched pair in this context, although biologically the movement of the foetus typically occurs in the fifth month (making option 2 biologically incorrect as well). The heart forms after one month [cite: 60-64, 474].
